meanings.sent1: She reregisters for the class after missing the deadline.
meanings.sent2: He always reregisters his car on time to avoid any issues.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful student had to reregister for the exam for the third time!
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for the event reregisters in her bright smile.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bell reregisters in his memory, reminding him of school days.

meanings.sent1: The system automatically reregisters the user for the next session.
meanings.sent2: After the error, she quickly reregisters the correct information.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully reregisters its territory by rubbing against the furniture.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to the cause reregisters in his consistent actions.
meanings.sent5: The melody reregisters in her mind, bringing back nostalgic feelings.
